mobilipy.preparation

Functions

prepare(df)

Cleans a raw GPS points dataframe by filtering in the zurich area, rearranging features and applying gaussian smoothing.
mobilipy.preparation._gaussian_smoothing(df, sigma=10) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame

Applies Gaussian smoothing on the given waypoints DataFrame :param df: DataFrame with points to be smoothed :type df: pandas.DataFrame :param sigma: :type sigma: float

Returns

pandas.DataFrame – the smoothed DataFrame

mobilipy.preparation.prepare(df) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame

Cleans a raw GPS points dataframe by filtering in the zurich area, rearranging features and applying gaussian smoothing. :param df: DataFrame to be prepared for route processing :type df: pandas.DataFrame

Returns

pandas.DataFrame – the preprocessed DataFrame
